doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 35 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 152[Air Date: 5/28/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 35 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 152[Air Date: 5/28/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Steve Endean returns to Gay Rights National Lobby2. United States Surgeon General orders all military personnel to take HTLVIII test3. Philadelphia funeral home refuses to handle deceased AIDS patient burialCOMMERCIAL: Brunch Buddies4. North Dakota gay bar bomb scare and increased patronage/support5. Dallas news6. Richard Gottlieb case7. Gay Pride Parade clip8. Bathhouse debate, includes clips of Dr. Steven Caiazza and Tom Stoddard9. AIDS and politics10. Ed Koch swears in Richard C. Failla, NYC's first openly gay criminal court judgeCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp11. Ed Koch spoke at gay synagogue12. Death of Bill OatesCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper13. Sports14. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Dr. Susan Trauss returns, discusses neurologic complications of AIDS15. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media report/current events/culture, includes clips and Steve RubellCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine2. Gay and Lesbian Press Association awards, includes clips from eventCOMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity with actor Jack Albertson3. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 35 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 152[Air Date: 5/28/1985]: May 1985
